 or <1>EQUIP</1> cards on your <1>SUBSCREEN</1>!

Play the game in its original mode!

You are about to enjoy Shantae and the Seven Sirens PART 1.

At the conclusion of PART 1, your game progress will be saved so it can be
loaded into PART 2, which will arrive via a future free update.

We hope you will enjoy Shantae and the Seven Sirens!

Your game progress from PART 1 has been loaded!

Get ready for the exciting conclusion to Shantae and the Seven Sirens!

Thank you for playing PART 1 of Shantae and the Seven Sirens!

Your adventure has been saved. You may continue to explore the
game world using the current Save File!

Any new items you collect will be carried over when the
free update containing PART 2 arrives. Enjoy!
Complete the game with 100% items at any speed.
Complete the game with any % items at any speed.
Complete the game with 100% items at high speed.
Complete the game at any % at extremely high speed.
Resolution saved. You must restart the game for the settings to take effect. Restart now?

ALL CLEAR! YOU GET %s BONUS GEMS
You don't have enough gems to continue playing!
If you ever want a refresher on how to play, tap this item in your inventory.
Default controls shown. Controls may be customized in the options screen.
Your save data on the cloud and on your device are different.
Warning: Choosing one save will delete the other
Warning: Select Local to override both. Select Cloud to Load and go back to Title.
...And just like that, the festival was over.
Before long, it was time to return home...
Automatically draws in nearby Gems and Hearts!
Automatically draws in Gems and Hearts from a greater distance!
Automatically draws in Gems and Hearts from a significant distance!
A potion that kicks in when your Hearts run dry!
A value pack of everyone's favorite healing item!
Quickly <1>DODGE</1> enemy attacks! Press <IB action=Dodge scale=0.5 /> to dash!
We can learn a lot from the ocean, perhaps!
An action figure based on Sequin Land's most famous superhero Bran-Son!
Processed food that restores small amount of health.
A list of <1>FIVE HALF-GENIES</1> who must be found! Check everywhere!
Introduce yourself to four more Half-Genie performers!
Introduce yourself to three more Half-Genie performers!
Introduce yourself to two more Half-Genie performers!
Introduce yourself to one more Half-Genie performer!
A gift from the Armor Baron to the mayor of Arena Town!
Success! Take it back to Arena Town's Mayor!
Increase the speed of the <1>TRANSFORMATION DANCES</1>!
The Ghost Elder near the sunken ships should see this!

Drill through the dirt!
Move against a <1>SOFT SURFACE</1> to <1>DRILL</1>!

Drill through the dirt!
Press against a <1>SOFT SURFACE</1> with <IB action=LSTICK scale=0.75/> to <1>DRILL</1>!
Swipe down on the screen in air to STOMP from above. You can also charge up and release <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_attack.anb scale=0.15/> to perform a destructive <1>SPIN DASH</1>!
Press <IB action=Stomp scale=0.75/> in air to <1>STOMP</1> from above. You can also charge up and release <IB action=Attack scale=0.75/> to perform a destructive <1>SPIN DASH</1>!
Swim underwater! Hold <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_attack.anb scale=0.15/> to swim more slowly!
Use <IB action=LSTICK scale=0.75/> to move underwater! Hold <IB action=Attack scale=0.75/> to swim more slowly!
A highly sought-after gemstone unique to this island!
Return this frightening doll to the Ghost Elder.
This doll's clothes suggest that it's from Armor Town.
Legendary food that restores massive amounts of health.
Looks like it attaches to something nearby!
Press <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_jump.anb scale=0.15/> in air to get a <1>DOUBLE</1> or <1>TRIPLE</1> jump!
Press <IB action=Jump scale=0.75/> in air to get a <1>DOUBLE</1> or <1>TRIPLE</1> jump!
Refill your <1>HEARTS</1> with this handy potion!
A money-saving value pack of Potions!
Some kind of instructional manual. Useless.
Spray-on armor that lowers the amount of damage taken by 25%!
Return this to the friendly doggo!
Plink is waiting backstage for one of these!
Refill your <1>MAGIC METER</1> with this handy potion!
Save your gems! Buy in volume!
A soft, hand made doll with buttons on it.
A map to the current location!
Wasn't <1>VERA</1> asking about something like this?
Bring <1>SIX SHELLS</1> to the scientist! Collect 5 more!
Bring <1>SIX SHELLS</1> to the scientist! Collect 4 more!
Bring <1>SIX SHELLS</1> to the scientist! Collect 3 more!
Bring <1>SIX SHELLS</1> to the scientist! Collect 2 more!
Bring <1>SIX SHELLS</1> to the scientist! Collect 1 more!
You found all <1>SIX SHELLS</1>! Take them to the scientist!

Dash and climb walls as a newt!
Press <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_fusion.anb scale=0.25/> in air to <1>DASH</1>.

Dash and climb walls as a newt!
Press <IB action=Dash scale=0.75/> in air to <1>DASH</1>.
Only the Champ of Legend can find all <1>THREE DAGRON BALLS</1>! Patent pending.
Metal Ore for the Armor Baron! He needs three of these.
Well-prepared food that restores a good amount of health.
Increase the <1>DAMAGE DEALT</1> by your hair!
Increase the <1>DAMAGE DEALT</1> by your hair!
Increase the <1>DAMAGE DEALT</1> by your hair!
Take this to the Control Room. Ghost Dog knows the way!
Tangy food that restores a lot of health.
Spare parts that can be used to repair a broken electric machine.
Return this to the friendly doggo!
Roasted fruit that restores a fair amount of health.
The words WEST HATCH are inscribed on it.
Expertly-prepared food that restores a ton of health.
Increase the <1>WHIPPING SPEED</1> of your hair!
Increase the <1>WHIPPING SPEED</1> of your hair!
Increase the <1>WHIPPING SPEED</1> of your hair!
Take these to the Squidsmith back in town!
Refills <1>HEARTS AND MAGIC</1>! What a deal!
Buy in bulk! Refill Hearts and Magic with one gulp!
Crunchy toast that's been stepped on. Bolo's favorite.
Some kind of energy conductor. But it's out of power.
Take no damage when destroyed by a pit!
Take zero damage when destroyed by spikes!
Hair Whip attack deals even more damage than before!
Reduce the amount of damage taken from enemy attacks!
The Magic Meter will refill over time!
All food types gain an extra healing boost when consumed!
Loot will be automatically drawn in from a greater distance!
Inflict even more damage when using the Newt Dash!
Extend the reach of the Newt Dash and fly further!
The Newt travels at super speed when dashing!
Zip up walls with reckless abandon as the Newt!
Drill through dirt much faster than before!
The Tortoise's Bash attack causes higher damage than before!
Deal more damage to foes using super powerful Tortoise Stomps!
The Tortoise Form will take less time to charge up!
The Seer Dance consumes less magic when used!
The Refresh Dance consumes less magic when used!
The Refresh Dance restores more Empty Hearts than before!
The Refresh Dance does more damage to sickly or undead foes!
The Spark Dance consumes less magic when used!
The Spark Dance does more damage to foes!
The Quake Dance consumes less magic when used!
The Quake Dance does more damage to foes!
Rockets inflict more damage to their targets!
Rockets travel much faster when chasing down their targets!
Rockets consumes less magic when used!
Increase the damage dealt by the bouncing Super Ball weapon!
The Super Ball travels much faster than before!
The Super Ball consumes less magic when used!
Increase the damage caused by Fireball magic!
Fireballs consume less magic when used!
The Shield consumes less magic when used!
The Boomerang does more damage than before!
Boomerangs are thrown with tremendous speed!
The Boomerang consumes less magic when used!
The Pike Ball weapon class deals even more damage to foes!
The Pike Ball consumes less magic when used!
Increase the odds of collecting dropped Hearts!
Increase the odds of collecting dropped Food!
Increase the number of dropped Gems!
Increase the odds of collecting dropped Magic!
Get reduced prices at any Item Shop!
Gain Shell-cracking strength that can defeat even Pincher monsters!
Automatically break jugs by walking into them!
Use your Hair Whip to convert Red Gems into Hearts!
Use your Hair Whip to convert Green Gems into Magic!
This card can't be identified at this time!
This card's abilities remain a mystery!
This mysterious dance can reveal things that are hidden from the naked eye! Try using it in a variety of places!
The power of nature can revive the weary and heal the sick - and restore Empty Hearts in the process!
Shake things up by calling forth powerful tremors! This dance deals heavy damage, and can even alter your surroundings...
Shock your foes with the power of this electrical dance. It may affect other objects as well...
Protect yourself from enemy projectiles with a <1>BUBBLE</1> shield!
Spend <1>MAGIC</1> to roast your foes from <1>LONG RANGE</1>!
Bring on the <1>SIZZLE</1> with heavy duty <1>FIREPOWER</1>! Consumes <1>MAGIC</1>.
An <1>ORBITING BALL</1> protects your bod! Consumes <1>MAGIC</1>.
Three <1>STEEL BALLS</1> orbit your body! Uses <1>MAGIC</1>.
Even more <1>FIREBALL</1> coverage than before! Consumes <1>MAGIC</1>.
Arm yourself with the mystical power of orbiting <1>SCIMITAR</1> blades!
Repel attacks with this powerful shield!
Shrug off enemy attacks with total invincibility!
Launch a bouncing projectile to hit foes at awkward angles! Boing!
Throw two of these powerful, rebounding balls at a time!
Throw three bouncing balls! Enemies, there's no escape!
Fire deadly projectiles that seek out targets on their own!
Increase the number, speed, and damage of these heat-seeking beauties!
Max out your rockets with top tier speed and damage!
Cast a wooden projectile that always comes back!
Cast two Boomerangs at a time, in a wide array.
Triple the fun! Cast a sweep of Boomerangs and slice your foes to bits!

You unlocked a Secret Gallery Image!
You unlocked a Secret Gallery Image!
You unlocked a Secret Gallery Image!
Zapple is waiting in Armor Town for one of these!
Harmony was looking for one of these!
Complete the game in new game plus.
You unlocked a Secret Gallery Image!
